item.description:
Shoot some pool and enjoy a brew (Back Bay IPA is my favorite!) at Boston Beer Works (on Canal St), before heading over to Grand Canal for dancing! Feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS:Let's hang out at Boston Beer Works (112 Canal St, Boston) for a bit so we can gather as a group.  Around 10, we will walk over to Grand Canal (57 Canal St, Boston) which is across the street for some dancing.  Try to get to Boston Beer Works before 10 to ensure you dont miss us, mostly because Grand Canal gets pretty busy, but if you arrive late or can't find the group call or text my cell (508-340-8635).  There is no cover at Beer Works, but might be at Grand Canal, around $5.

The closest T stop is Haymarket.

These are casual venues.

Hope to see you there!! -Ashley
item.how_to_find_us: My profile picture should give you an idea of who to look for, and my cell is 508-340-8635.

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Beers, Round of Pool, & Dancing! - Friday Apr. 8th
